## pick variable

Uses TOS as index to look up a deeper d-stack value, then places it as new TOS. Throws error if stack depth is &lt; `x`<!-- -->.

( ... x -- ... stack\[x\] )

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pick: (ctx: StackContext) => StackContext
```
